account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with this address.

customer_name.description: The name of the customer associated with this address.

date_created.description: The date and time when the address was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the address was last updated.

emergency_enabled.description: Indicates whether emergency services are enabled for this address.

friendly_name.description: A friendly name or label for the address.

iso_country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the address.

postal_code.description: The postal code of the address.

region.description: The region or state of the address.

sid.description: The unique identifier of the address.

street_secondary.description: Additional information about the street address, such as suite number.

validated.description: Indicates whether the address has been validated.

verified.description: Indicates whether the address has been verified.

uri.description: The URI of the address resource.
